document_data.name: Onster Glarrak
document_data.mainbody: '''Onster Glarrak''' was a member of the [[Council of Tarmalune|Council]] of [[Tarmalune]] as of [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Description: Onster was described as a fat and unlovely [[human]].
document_data.Activities: Onster was a wealthy investor who was well-informed of many things in Tarmalune. He was one of the loudest voices in the Council.
